SEARCH
Module info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student
Package info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.student

Interface StudentQuery

All Known Subinterfaces:
AdvancedQuery, GroupQuery
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdvancedQueryTest, GroupQueryTest, StudentDB, StudentQueryTest
public interface StudentQuery
Easy-version interface for Student homework of Java Advanced course.

Students ordered by name: students ordered by last name in ascending order; students with equal last names are ordered by first name in ascending order; students having equal both last and first names are ordered by id in descending order.

Author:
Georgiy Korneev (kgeorgiy@kgeorgiy.info)
